patthana15.33:1.1_0: Sāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.33:1.1_1: Anāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.33:2.1_0: Sāsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.33:3.1_0: Sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
